pkgmetadata.longdescription: Make R Objects Searchable by Matching Names Based on Case (in)Sensitivity, Regular Expressions, ... // Provides functionality for searching named vectors and lists more configurable. The packages uses 'stringr'-style match modifiers to allow for matching by case (in)sensitivity, regular expressions or fixed expression. It also allows searching through values rather than names. This functionality facilitates creating dictionary and thesaurus like structures.
